Self-diagnosis: Use the internet and medical books to research symptoms and diagnose yourself.
Herbal remedies: Learn about herbs and plants that can cure common ailments and use them to treat yourself.
Community support: Join a community of like-minded individuals who are also dealing with the same situation and support each other through it.
DIY medical procedures: Learn basic medical procedures and perform them on yourself.
Telemedicine: Use telemedicine to consult with doctors and medical professionals from around the world.
